# zoomonitor

AC:1

Rule: Animal should have a name and a type (flying, swimming, walking)

When I add an animalDto
Then it is in my zoo

URI: /zoo/animals
VERB: POST
HTTP_STATUS: 201
Request:

{
"name":"Lion",
"type":"walking"
}

Response:

{
"id":"autogeneratedId"
"name":"Lion",
"type":"walking"
}

AC:2


Given I have added animals to my zoo
When I check my zoo
Then I see all the animals

URI: /zoo/animals
VERB: GET
HTTP_STATUS: 200

Response:

[
{
"id":1,
"name":"Lion",
"type":"walking"
},
{
"id":2,
"name":"Parrot",
"type":"flying"
}
]
